Body:
element_str, is_valid = element_valid
assert validate_element_str(element_str
    ) == is_valid, 'Element validation is not successful'
pytest.mark.parametrize('element_valid', [('He', True), ('H', True), ('Fe',
    True), ('he', False), ('h', False), ('Fe2O3', False), ('50', False), (
    'Fe ', False), ('', False)])
